channel.title: Comments on: Handsontable – jQuery grid editor

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/07/27/handsontable-jquery-grid-editor/#comment-3965">Alex Mills (Viper007Bond)</a>.
There has been some discussion about possible forumla implementations: https://github.com/warpech/jquery-handsontable/issues/22
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alex Mills (Viper007Bond).

There has been some discussion about possible forumla implementations: https://github.com/warpech/jquery-handsontable/issues/22

item.title: By: Alex Mills (Viper007Bond)
item.dc:creator: Alex Mills (Viper007Bond)
item.description:
<blockquote>No formula support</blockquote>
Seems like you could use one of the callback functions maybe to implement it.
item.content:encoded:
No formula support

Seems like you could use one of the callback functions maybe to implement it.
